definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
live relay/broadcast of actual scene/to broadcast live

sentences.english: Nonprofits could use it to livestream video from events.
sentences.chinese: 非营利组织可以用它来进行公益事件的实况转播。

sentences.english: Most Bostonian choose to watch the firework on TV at home.
sentences.chinese: 老波士顿人都选择猫在家里看电视转播。

sentences.english: A moment of low intensity in a televised football game is seen by some as time to change channels.
sentences.chinese: 转播的足球比赛若是稍不激烈，一些人就准备换台。

sentences.english: The game was relayed by satellite to audiences all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛通过卫星向全世界的观众进行了转播。

sentences.english: The match will be broadcast live.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛将作实况转播。

sentences.english: As distinct from Rights Holder(RHB), Press do not pay a rights fee to cover the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 与转播商不同的是，文字媒体无需支付版权费。

sentences.english: I'm sure they will try to televise as many games as they can.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定中国会尽他们可能转播比赛的。

sentences.english: This essay introduces the experience in reform of digital relay vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 介绍数字转播车改造的经验与体会。

sentences.english: The program was telecast live via satellite.
sentences.chinese: 该节目经由卫星以电视现场转播。

sentences.english: But generally most of the games I see are televised with football.
sentences.chinese: 但通常，我看的大多数比赛都是电视转播的足球赛。

sentences.english: Through television, the IOC makes most of its money by selling rights to broadcast the games.
sentences.chinese: 国际奥委会的大部分收入来自于赛事的电视转播费。

sentences.english: The sport has also tapped Asia's wealth through the sale of television rights and advertising.
sentences.chinese: 英格兰足球还通过发售电视转播权和广告从亚洲创收。

sentences.english: TVB had full discretion every year to cut out any parts of the show from its broadcast.
sentences.chinese: 无线电视每年均有全权选择在转播时剪掉任何内容。

sentences.english: There's no rebroadcast of the soccer game tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚没有足球赛的转播了。

sentences.english: The television programmes from all over the world are bounced off satellites.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的电视节目都由通信卫星转播。

sentences.english: We watched the football match on live show television.
sentences.chinese: 我们看了电视实况转播的足球比赛。

definition: to direct a television or radio broadcast/director (TV, radio)
live broadcast (not recorded)/direct Internet broadcasting/(agriculture) direct seeding
